title: Understanding Graphical Representations
text: A graphical representation helps visualize data to identify patterns or relationships between variables.

title: Focus on Numerical Variables
text: The question asks for a representation that shows the relationship between two numerical variables. Consider graphs that plot data points based on numerical values.

title: Common Graph Types
text: Common types of graphs include scatter plots, histograms, box plots, and bar charts. Each serves a different purpose in data visualization.

title: Scatter Plot Characteristics
text: A scatter plot displays individual data points on a two-dimensional graph, showing the relationship between two numerical variables.

title: Identify the Correct Graph Type
text: The correct graph type for showing the relationship between two numerical variables is a scatter plot.
